meanings.definition: Of or relating to a person's life story
meanings.sent1: The book provided a biographical account of the famous author's life.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading biographical novels about historical figures.
meanings.sent3: The biographical details in the movie were so accurate that it felt like watching history unfold.
meanings.sent4: Her face was a biographical map of all the experiences she had lived through.
meanings.sent5: The biographical essence of the painting captured the essence of the artist's soul.
